duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee freight audit operations to ensure accurate and timely payment processing for all inbound and outbound shipments.
Collaborate with logistics, sourcing, and finance teams to verify and reconcile invoices for accuracy and compliance with contract terms.
Resolve payment discrepancies and maintain positive relationships with logistics providers.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and implement best practices in freight audit procedures.
Develop data analytics to monitor key performance indicators and provide regular reports on metrics to management.
Maintain strong relationships with logistics providers and freight audit vendors to ensure smooth audit processes.
Stay up-to-date with industry regulations, payment policies, and market trends to ensure compliance.
Work closely with other departments to improve overall supply chain performance.
Coach and mentor team members, fostering a supportive and high-performing work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college or a high school diploma/GED and minimum 6 years of relevant experience.
Proficient in data analysis and reporting using relevant tools to make data-driven decisions.
